phrases.phrase: 테리가 그러는데 새 여자 친구와 사랑에 빠졌다더군.
meanings: 이성교제 Terry said he is in love with a new girl.
whether someone does something or not

vlive.korean: 너까지 나한테 왜 그러는데? What's wrong with you? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 필독) 트렌디하게 불륜남녀 조지는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.03
막 그러는데 어떻게 생각해? What do you think about that? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 혀니비니🐖🐇🦡
vlive.english: What do you think about that?

vlive.korean: '금동현 어딨어요?' 그러는데? "Where is Geum Donghyun?" 듣기 View video tvN D : 언어의 온도 포스터 촬영현자아앙😝❣
나한테만 그러는데? Why are you only doing this to me? 듣기 View video VICTON : 2020
vlive.english: Why are you only doing this to me?

vlive.korean: 왜 나한테만 그러는데? Why are you only being like that to me? 듣기 View video VICTON : 2020
vlive.english: Why are you only being like that to me?

examples.korean: This shirt I bought’s too small—I’ll have to change it for a bigger one. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제가 산 이 셔츠가 너무 작아서 그러는데요 더 큰 걸로 교환해야 할 것 같아요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This shirt I bought’s too small—I’ll have to change it for a bigger one. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have to go out for a minute—will you cover for me if anyone asks where I am? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 잠깐 나갔다 와야 해서 그러는데, 누가 나 어딨냐고 물으면 적당히 좀 둘러대 줄래? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have to go out for a minute—will you cover for me if anyone asks where I am? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As a matter of interest, what time did the party finish? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 궁금해서 그러는데, 파티가 몇 시에 끝났나요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As a matter of interest, what time did the party finish? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Somebody in the know told me he’s going to resign. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사정을 잘 아는 누가 그러는데 그 사람 사직한대요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Somebody in the know told me he’s going to resign. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: According to Mick, it’s a great movie. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미크가 그러는데 그거 굉장한 영화래. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: According to Mick, it’s a great movie. Add to Wordbook
